VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny, SDGO Trolls (Mudrock is a retard, disregard him)
Please check in with your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Soft Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, but not melee or projectiles.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Important Tip Videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A

Only you can stop autism. Make an effort, raise autism awareness.

dorkly chair of the institute for space politics Wed Jun 06 2012 16:37:06 No.7853420 ViewReport	
http://www.mediafire.com/i/?lxpvcgov47tz950 is a pic too big for /m/ depicting - a >the massive “space vehicle” that would be the feature attraction of EPCOT’s fabled Space pavilion
other words about the original Space pavilion
>Oh, the Space pavilion. If anything puts a wistful look in the eye of a true EPCOT geek, it’s a mention of the Space pavilion. This grand, massive attraction was announced for EPCOT early on, and later slipped to phase II status behind Life & Health. It never saw the light of day.
>Little is really known about this pavilion, but not for lack of fan curiosity. Produced with the assistance of author Ray Bradbury, the centerpiece of this pavilion would have been a massive simulator attraction that would have moved an entire theater in sync with outer-space visuals.
>“SPACE PAVILION: Designer John De Cuir, Sr. and Writer Ray Bradbury discuss the model of the interstellar “Space Vehicle” which will highlight this pavilion.”
>A huge, interstellar “Space Vehicle” will transport passengers to the outer frontiers of the universe, highlighting man’s efforts to reach out for the stars around him … from the early pioneers who looked and wondered … to modern-day space travelers and their triumphs … to the challenges and possibilities of future space technology and exploration.

Eh, I still prefer the work of one girl on pixi who ships Muza and Byman. Because they're soooooo tsundere, dontcha know. For best pic take a look inside this image collection (pixi id code: 17083590) Because around these parts, we deliver. Well, I try to anyway.

Here's the story background from the Odyssey storybook on the Quentians and the ancient Overmen. Gattai the two halves, and away you go!
http://www.mediafire.com/

?d1k604flqrzpgos

The man over at Ani pages basically says that Taniguchi appears to have been recognized at being good at distilling Chirico's essence into moving drawings, and that's why he did so much genga. Shioyama was apparently a-ok with this development. You can check the ani pages post for more details on that. It's more detailed than the French interview as well so I won't bother posting that. Suffice to say that Taniguchi still does genga in the industry to this very day, which is rare as most people move beyond that in their career. Check out his credentials and you might be surprised at what he's worked on. He still counts Votoms as one of his favorites, out of all the stuff he's worked on.

This is a pic from the series novelizations. Note dem eyelashes.

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7802836


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Important Tip Videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A

Anonymous Thu May 24 2012 15:27:13 No.7804826 ViewReport	
Gunbuster PS2 is done. Going to try Aquarion now.

http://www.mediafire.com/#g8u2atrb0rrcj

>>7804466
I'd say it's a typical action game. You get Mars, Solar and Luna and can swap on the fly with the triggers. You get all of the DEVA pilots from the show, level up stats (only basics like HP, defense, attack) and the pilot proficiency of each formation.

Yes, you can toss anyone in any Vector. I'd say that's the best part of the game. They aren't locked. IE: You can have Apollo use Mars, Pierre use Luna and Sirius use Solar and they all get new attacks depending on which they one they use.

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7785120


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Important Tip Videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A

Zyuranger 16
MegaWikiAnon !!SR4r2NLZDot Thu May 24 2012 00:17:44 No.7802739 ViewReport	
The writer for this episode is Susumu Takaku. He's best known for writing episodes for Mazinger Z (particularly the first 2 episodes) Cutey Honey, GoLion, Devilman, and the screenplays for the first Fist of the North Star movie, and Mazinger Z vs Devilman. So if you've seen any of his works before this probably isn't going to be too bizzare for you. For the rest of you, I hope you like sneezing power, soccer balls, creepy pedo clowns, and "Pussy Posca".

That's all for this week! We'll see you next week with a truly historic episode, and the start so a truly amazing storyarc.

Dynamic Pro Scanlations, Hokuto no Gun, Happy Scans
SantaBla !!yGFL30HokTJ Mon May 21 2012 10:05:06 No.7792242 ViewReport	
Remaking thread with more CREDITS.

Dynamic Superobot Wars - Super Robot Retsuden Chapter 1

The ultimate cross over manga featuring Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger, Grendizer, Getter Robo, Getter Robo G and Jeeg! These all-stars band together in order to defend Earth from cosmic evil. This manga is in the same vein as all those old Toei cross over movies, and the self-parody gets pretty strong later on. This series by Ken Ishikawa has been collected into one volume featuring ten chapters.

http://www.mediafire.com/?k16cebypybk7j79

Thank to Wright for purchasing this volume, and Hokuto no Gun's Katatonia and Systematic-Chaos for translating it!
GoogleiqdbSauceNAO Super Robot Retsuden-000.jpg, 567 kB, 1600x1055

Distract Sakuya first and then send out others to deal with Kurumi and Elly. If all you want is to get the WP, just have Marisa say hi to Yuuka in order to make Yuuka 'officially' name her attack Master Spark.

Otherwise, if you want to shoot her down, you'll need to have been playing the game just leading up to that moment (upgrade distribution, ability unlocking, etc). Anyway, don't forget to abuse character abilities such as Reimu's Youkai Buster and make good use of upgrades based on who you think can best Support Attack.

Mobile Suit Gundam Thunderbolt
Deacon Blues Thu May 17 2012 14:42:00 No.7777263 ViewReport	
Manga by: Yasuo Ohtagaki

A Zaku II Sniper type hides itself in the Thunderbolt sector. Meanwhile, an operation begins with the intent of gaining total control of this sector, which is a supply route to the fortress A Baoa Qu within Zeon’s sphere of influence. To accomplish this task and take out the sniper, the Federation Forces fleet and mobile suit unit are led by the Mua Brotherhood, former inhabitants of the Mua space colonies destroyed by Zeon. All 24 units of the mobile suit unit sortie. Among them is Ensign Io Flemming, pilot of the GM204F.

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7763351


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Important Tip Videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A

Nu SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7754354


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7750107


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame . tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note: If you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Usual thread important videos:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzpndHtdl9A
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VA6Q3vTC_o

Speed Hard Cap: 24.9

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Linebarrels of Iron, complete! (mostly)
SMG Wed May 02 2012 03:46:14 No.7723012 ViewReport	
Good day gentlemen!

We have finally finished scanlating what is available of Linebarrels of Iron, which we started about a year ago here on the board.

Vol17 - http://www.mediafire.com/?eu58kheyp4nb6th
Vol18 - http://www.mediafire.com/?an78v73x73kt6ki

Past volumes/chapters can be found here:
http://smgscanlations.wordpress.com/

Now that Linebarrels is for the most part, finished, what other series would the board like to see translated? The only raws I have on hand, that aren't currently being translated by other groups, is Fortune Brigade, FMP! Another and Front Mission Dog Style & Dog Life, the last of which is currently receiving official french translations. We will also take suggestions of other series for our next project!

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

GoogleiqdbSauceNAO erexion.png, 438 kB, 544x353
Erexion
Anonymous Wed Apr 25 2012 20:58:40 No.7697506 ViewReport	
This is a little known, or at least little watched, Korean toku that got four episodes translated by Evolution Fansubs.

It's about a group of people taken out of different times in history to help save a civilization from an evil lord. Three of them are from the past, two of them are from the present, and the other two are part of the civilization that needs saving.

Both the villain dynamic and the dynamics of the heroes are what separates this show from most others.

http://www.mediafire.com/?8pyt0nnazp7me

VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Anonymous Sat Apr 21 2012 16:50:02 No.7681370 ViewReport	
It's funny that people bitch about Katoki drawing everything the same, since that's EXACTLY what Kyoshi Takigawa does. Literally everything in the RX-78 and GM master archive share 60% of the same legs. Ironically, that homogenization of the Federation MS frame may be unimpressive from a drawing standpoint, but it actually works to the lore's benefit, since it make it a bit more believable that the Federation was able to pump out so many GM and Gundam Variants, since they're basically all built on the same frame.

Anonymous Fri Apr 20 2012 20:49:43 No.7678661 ViewReport	
srsly guys

If you need to download music that's correctly tagged and of decent quality (you can have FLAC if you must) at least hone in your Google-fu skills. Yes you can download them off YouTube if you can find a video of a song that's been done in HQ and a decent converter, but it'd be better off looking at these sites:

nyaa
nipponsei
gendou
bakabt (yes they do soundtracks)
tpb
isohunt
Google (type down name song, then mediafire, filestube or something)

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Anonymous Sat Apr 14 2012 04:39:35 No.7652595 ViewReport	
Quoted By: >>7654040
Scanlation progress: 32/32

http://www.mediafire.com/?nuxx0t5hhczb21d

Enjoy, bros.

Few interesting things: This takes places before episode 1 of the anime. You'll notice Kanade carries a container of pills around her neck and has to take one before she transforms. Minister Hiroki has an appearance, he's the guy that Ryoko had killed during the series. Ryoko and Kanade play Dragon Quest based on the references in the dialog on page 11 (I did not add those). "FG-Type" is never explained but I assume it stands for "(F)Phonic Gain." There's a lot of technical jargon that's hard to translate, so I took a few minor liberties. I think you'll all agree "Power armor" just sounds better than "Special opportunity costume."

Feel free to comment/question, I'm always lurking.

Still looking for raws of the other chapters, btw. Vol 1 is due out in May, so hopefully then.

Anonymous Tue Apr 10 2012 05:17:06 No.7636003 ViewReport	
Reposting in case Owarinaki OST anon missed it:

Thanks for the OST.I think I have identified two of the tracks.
Unidentified Cello Classical Piece 1: Bach, Cello Suite No.1 in G Major (Prelude)
Unidentified Violin Classical Piece 2: Bach, Partita III for Violin solo in E Major (Gavotte and Rondo)
Incidentally the two also showed up in Evangelion:Death as Shinji and Asuka's "solo"s, respectively.
The remaining two are either from the Baroque or Classical periods, but don't take me up on this. Maybe Bach, Mozart and/or pre-Eroica Beethoven?

Also, you don't mind if i post the TE scans here, right?
http://www.mediafire.com/?nm2mu571fado6

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Patrick Colasour !!Yjq8NuI2PJe Fri Mar 30 2012 11:49:02 No.7586457 ViewReport	
Ok here we go, link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?l4cdxhzi6z4c3dg
And a copy past of the quick guide thats inside the rar
Part 1:
" Disclaimer! READ THIS PART YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
The odds of anything going wrong with a PSP and CFW related stuff these days is really low but in the event that something does go wrong and your PSP is bricked or anything else I take no responsibility for it.

1. Read this
2. ????
3. Profit!

But seriously psp hacking these days is a heck of a lot easier. Included in the zip file was a folder called update with eboot.pbp inside it, put that folder in your PSPs game folder (e.g. X:\PSP\GAME)
Also included in the zip file is a folder called 660-B10, open that folder and copy all the contents to your PSPs root directory (e.g. X:\) It will ask to over write some stuff as the folders already exist, hit yes."

NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny

When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb

*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

Anonymous Fri Mar 30 2012 04:56:33 No.7585738 ViewReport	
Quoted By: >>7585801
Well Kanade fans, I bring sad news.

No booklet, no image for the CD. That fan art cover is the closest you're going to get. The CD sits with the BD disk in the case (see image). There is a booklet for the BD that includes some character design pages, but nothing specific to the CD.

If that wasn't enough I now know why poor Kanade's CD was limited to this BD release. It's because it only has 1 song, and that's the one she sang in the first episode (her version of the second song on Hibiki's character CD). So the CD only has that and the off-vocal version. Nothing else.

I uploaded rips of the two tracks in a rar file you can grab here:

http://www.mediafire.com/?dizom2yzmurbc4t

Better than nothing I suppose.

SDGO General
Anonymous Tue Mar 27 2012 03:59:34 No.7575034 ViewReport	
New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here: >>7562804


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame[spoilers].[/spoilers]tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, taking cover, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want to train spartan style.

>>7550503
MuvLuv isn't about walking death machines killing aliens and all that. If you can't get into EXTRA and Unlimited, you will miss practically everything that the main story is all about. It's like eating a cake, but just eating the frosting.

Side stories are like small chunks of candy you can eat long after the cake has been finished. You can enjoy the candy even without the cake.

But nevertheless, if you want to get into it all, you might want to check the archives http://www.mediafire.com/?kkc1fh9l077sn

MOBILE SUIT CROSSBONE GUNDAM GHOST [CHAPTER.04]
Deacon Blues Sun Mar 18 2012 16:35:03 No.7542623 ViewReport	
Having escaped the enemy on the space ship Manzana Flor, Font is screened to become a member of the team. Just as they’re heading to a briefing room, a broadcast is made by Tetenith Dogatie, head of the Jupiter Foundation. The mysterious “Angel Call” was stolen from them some time ago and they’re on a mission to get it back. The very existence of the mysterious meteorite spells catastrophe for the Earth sphere as well as all of mankind if it’s used! Through he separation from the Jupiter Republic, she proclaims the revival of the Crossbone Vanguard to find it no matter what! Font soon learns just how deadly Angel Call really is: it’s a strong pathogen that causes a fatal disease, a space microbe with a different base sequence!

DDL: http://www.mediafire.com/?sdf8dof5h7ofsc9

With that, Crossbone is caught up.

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here >>7530661


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want train spartan style.

Deacon Blues Tue Mar 13 2012 16:50:03 No.7524023 ViewReport	
MOBILE SUIT CROSSBONE GUNDAM GHOST
CHAPTER.03 MESSENGER FROM THOUCUS

Curtis goes to battle with the mysterious envoy from Jupiter. However, he’s having difficulty fighting an enemy he’s not familiar with! After having trained to recognize certain enemy mobile suits via audio feedback, the Crossbone Gundam has nothing on the new Desphys! Curtis is forced to rely on Font to convey information to him, but that doesn’t go over too well. Just when it seems like things have gone from bad to worse, the accompanying Zanscare forces attempt to move in, but they’re mowed down by the Desphys! Weren’t they working together?! Staring death in the face, Font takes things into his own hands by launching another mobile suit straight at the enemy!

DDL: http://www.mediafire.com/?f62zyubgk4c6xtr

New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here >>7509344


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want train spartan style.

[KITsubs] Kamen Rider Episode 27
Steel A Jeeg !ZM1mP7KzH6 Sat Mar 10 2012 03:25:03 No.7510963 ViewReport	
This episode is huge. Colonel Zol is kidnapping children to build a secret guerrilla army for Shocker (#Zol2012) and before Taki and Ichimonji can investigate, they have to face off against two reconstructed Shocker cyborgs!
Everything about this episode is great. The story, the action, the directing... there's a ton of great foreshadowing and a great scene between Taki and Ichimonji. You don't want to miss it!

mkv - http://www.fileserve.com/file/cTK8rEP
avi - http://www.fileserve.com/file/W6KGfsU
script - http://www.mediafire.com/?64bbkcg1efas2fs
mkv torrent - http://www.nyaa.eu/?page=torrentinfo&tid=294777
avi torrent - http://www.nyaa.eu/?page=torrentinfo&tid=294778

Anonymous Fri Mar 09 2012 17:25:02 No.7509344 ViewReport	
New SD Gundam Capsule Fighter Online Thread
Old one here >>7498439


Wiki: http://www.sdgowiki.com
Comprehensive MS Information: http://www.olgame.tw/sds/robot_inq.php
VM trick for free Astros (Simple): http://pastebin.com/vm1QamEU
VM trick for free Astros (Detailed): http://pastebin.com/ikqXsYVz
Astro Offers: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fyJ2ttwZHvhbOf8W6BE_n8cHUN-AkHN7yZXJ-oFKHGU/edit

NA Website: sdgo.ogplanet.com/en/main.og
NA /m/ Clans: OZ Military, Men of Eternity, Men of Destiny
Please check in every day in your respective clan for attendance.
MoD, MoE and OZ have open spots for new applicants.
When you send an application, POST YOUR IN GAME NAME IN THE CURRENT SDGO THREAD OR IT WILL BE REJECTED

/m/ Music Pack: http://www.mediafire.com/?t6xx2cnd534a822 / http://www.mediafire.com/?w8gds7781hb3rkb
SDGO Mods Starter Pack*: http://www.mediafire.com/?1y7xb3ap8yn6yyk
*Includes Banagher Operator, a Blue Beam Saber effect, a Greytone Interface, and more.

AGI Benchmarks: 4.5 \ 9 \ 13.5 \ 18 \ 22.5 \ 27 \ 31.5 \36 \ 40.5 \ 45 \ 49.5
Speed Hard Cap: 24.9
Note: You get more out of your custom points for AGI, HP, SPD but less for OC.

Q. Is there hard caps for other stats?
A. No.

Q. What does Agility affect?
A. Higher Agility shortens animations like stopping a boost, changing direction, starting a boost, etc. The speed of melee and projectiles are not affected.

Q. What servers are /m/ on?
A. NA mainly. Some of us are on KR and SEA though.

Note, if you're a new player don't be concerned about learning how to do advanced techniques. Focus on learning tactics, maneuvering, and teamwork. B ranks are good to start off with because your mistakes are cushioned a bit. C ranks are also worth trying if you want train spartan style.
